nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of asset.

extractedSize.description: Total extracted size of the firmware in bytes.

rootFileSystems.description: The number of root file systems found.

FirmwareSummary.description: Summary result after scanning the firmware.

isUpdateAvailable.description: Flag if new update is available for the component.

architecture.description: The architecture of the uploaded firmware.

runpath.description: The runpath of the uploaded firmware.

rpath.description: The rpath of the uploaded firmware.

totalFiles.description: Total number of binaries that were analyzed

value.description: The list of binary hardening results.

filePath.description: File path of the password hash

size.description: Size of the key in bits

isShortKeySize.description: Indicates the key size is considered too small to be secure for the algorithm type.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of asset.

filePaths.description: List of files paths for this certificate

signatureAlgorithm.description: The signature algorithm used in the certificate.

keyAlgorithm.description: The key algorithm used in the certificate.

keySize.description: Size of the key in bits

encoding.description: The encoding used for the certificate.

selfSigned.description: Indicates if the certificate was self-signed.

isWeakAlgorithm.description: Indicates the algorithm used is insecure.

isShortKeySize.description: Indicates the key size is considered too small to be secure for the algorithm type.

CryptoCertEntity.description: Information on an entity in a cryptographic certificate

organizationalUnit.description: The Organizational unit of the certificate entity.

state.description: Geographical state of the certificate entity.

region.description: Geographical region of the certificate entity.

critical.description: The total number of critical severity CVEs detected

high.description: The total number of high severity CVEs detected

medium.description: The total number of medium severity CVEs detected

low.description: The total number of low severity CVEs detected

unknown.description: The total number of unknown severity CVEs detected

undefined.description: The total number of undefined severity CVEs detected

cvssScore.description: A single CVSS score to represent the CVE. If a V3 score is specified, then it will use the V3 score. Otherwise if the V2 score is specified it will be the V2 score

ResourcesQuery.description: Details necessary to query analysis results.

top.description: The maximum number of rows that the query should return.

skip.description: The number of rows to skip from the beginning of the results.

ResourcesData.description: Paginated and optionally filtered analysis results

analysisType.description: Specifies the type of analysis result.

count.description: Number of records returned in the current response.

totalRecords.description: Number of total records matching the query.
